list.abs: 荷兰风车(Dutch Windmill)：人们常把荷兰称为"风车之国"，荷兰是欧洲西部一个只有一千多万人口的国家。它的真正国名叫"尼德兰"。

entry.tran: 风车磨坊；（风力发电的）风车
entry.def: A windmill is a building with long pieces of wood on the outside which turn around as the wind blows and provide energy for a machine that crushes grain. A windmill is also a similar structure that is used to convert the power of the wind into electricity.

means.word_mean: 1. a mill that is powered by the wind
2. generator that extracts usable energy from winds

sentences.en: For some reason he thinks everyone is out to get him, but he’s really just tilting at windmills.
sentences.cn: 不知为什么他觉得每个人都想害他,但其实他不过是在庸人自扰。
